WorkItem.Description:
I ran Optimizer from Rawr 2.1.7 and after it finished the optimization the model had equipped 3xSolid Dragon's Eye + 1xDelicate Dragon's Eye, making it 4 equipped Jewelers Gem at the same time. As far as I know we are still limited to max 3 prismatic gems equipped at the same time.
Â 
I re-ran the optimization and next time the result had 6 prismatic gems equipped.

Comments.Message:
Update:
1.- I deleted the Rawr 2.1.7 folder I used on my previous post to get a clean start
2.- Imported profile from Character Profiler
3.- Selected gems and enchants.

This time when I run the optimization I no longer get 4 or 6 equipped Prismatic Gems, instead now I am only getting 1 or 2 :(
Something seems to be broken with prismatic gems.
